name: Haunted House (itch) (alexfeetham98)
description:
The is the first of 3 games being made as part of the Low Level Programming Module for BSc Games Technology at UWE Bristol.

The game is a modern day port of an old game in which you would teach yourself programming skills to create the game. Originally designed to run in Basic, I will be making my own version of the game using the ASGE Framework in the Clion IDE using C++.
